title: Nine Inch Nails - The Downward Spiral SACD FLAC - READ INFO
description:
A while back on Soulseek I stumbled upon a rip of the SACD portion of the Downward Spiral in .ac3 format. Hearing it downmixed to stereo without surround sound on Foobar2000, I was absolutely stunned at how every little element jumped out at me on each song - better than any version I had ever heard. I decided earlier today to convert the Ac3 files into WAV and then FLAC with the help of a tool called PX3Convert, so I've uploaded these excellent sounding -- STEREO -- FLACs onto PirateBay to share this album as it was meant to be heard on the SACD. I've also included the original AC3 files that I discovered on SLSK.

Further, other than an avid NIN fan, I happen to be a gay rapper, responsible for that remix of Came Back Haunted (which I admit wasn't to my liking - nor anybody else's, so I've included a link to my good stuff on Datpiff.com.)

Enjoy these incredible sounding FLACs of one of the best NIN albums!
